data.message: Was hacked yesterday on F B .Someone posing as a friend asked to b re friended.Looked legit so re friended.After a few sentences realized it was not.These people are really working hard to get personal info.So be careful out there.

replies.message: Hi Sheila.  If you think your account was taken over by someone else, we can help you secure it. Learn more: http://on.fb.me/1vduj8e  -Chantal
My account was hacked into also.
You have to be careful who you friend
I had two people ask to be friended that I didn't know.  I refused.
I always look at their Fb page and mutual friends.
Thanks for your post.  It was informative.
Lynn Komski Miller, Sheila Lester, please, how can I tell if I have been hacked, huh??
Please Charlene Briggs, how can I tell if I have been hacked, huh???

Yeah I had this so called army guy wanting to talk so when I asked him what time it was over there he stalled by talking about other stuff then 5mins later he told me. I told him he was a fake and got rid of him then 2 days later another military guy pops up like I'm gonna fall for it again. but they put virus on so I cleaned computer for $30 with WinZip. Great Job!
I keep forgetting my password . Have to get new one readd my friends and explain what happened . Its embarrassing
Dearest Ms Sheila Lester, Charlene Briggs how do I know if I have been hacked, huh!!!!!
